msg1.content: Teams, we begin to tire of your progress. As we realize your hunger is likely slowing you down, we have coralled several animals at Oxon Hill Farm.

msg2.content: Hey, watch yourselves. Apparently those jerks from District 3 have left you a little surprise up ahead.

msg3.content: ANNOUNCEMENT: You may no longer win as a team. Instead, you must fight and kill each other until only a single Tribute remains! That is all.

msg4.content: Go to the next location as instructed, but when you get there ignore the new rules. It's important that you keep working together.

msg5.content: It's time to go on the offensive.
